document_data.name: Tamal
document_data.mainbody: '''Tamal''' was the young prince of the [[dwarven]] [[Orothiar Clan]] in the [[Barony of Bloodstone]] as of the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.
document_data.Personality: Tamal was fairly immature. He spoke constantly and had a wacky sense of humor.
document_data.History:
In 1357 DR, Tamal and his tribe met [[Gareth Dragonsbane]]'s party and he may have decided to join the party.

In the {{YearlinkName|1359}}, Tamal joined the [[Twilight Riders]] despite the concerns of his father. He turned out to be a skilled and valued member of the Riders.
